name: Weapon Shop Fantasy
description: A shop game with RPG? Or is it RPG with a shop? Collect materials, Craft weapons, Train your staff and defeat your enemy! This is Weapon Shop Fantasy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2GHz+ or better Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or later DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
